official_title: To amend the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to allow the area of a Presidentially declared disaster to include the outer Continental Shelf.
short_title: Offshore Infrastructure Emergency Relief Act of 2005

summary.text: Offshore Infrastructure Emergency Relief Act of 2005 - Amends the Robert T. Stafford Disaster Relief and Emergency Assistance Act to encompass the Outer Continental Shelf within the definition of "United States," thus authorizing its inclusion in presidentially declared disaster areas.
